jcr:content.jcr:title: You Think You Really Know Me: The Gary Wilson Story

contentheadline.headline: You Think You Really Know Me: The Gary Wilson Story

contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox film | name = You Think You Really Know Me: The Gary Wilson Story <!-- Commented out because image was deleted: | image = Youthinkyoureallyknowhimposter.jpg --> | caption = Promotional poster | director = [[Michael Wolk]] | producer = [[Michael Wolk]], Kumiko Yoshii | starring = [[Gary Wilson (musician)|Gary Wilson]]<br />Ross Harris<br />Frank Roma<br />Adrian Milan | music = [[Gary Wilson (musician)|Gary Wilson]] | cinematography = Bob Green | editing = Mustafa Bhagat | distributor = Gorgeous Entertainment | released = 2005 | runtime = 74 min. | language = [[English language|English]] | budget = | preceded_by = | followed_by = }} '''''You Think You Really Know Me: The Gary Wilson Story''''' is a [[documentary film|documentary]] about the experimental musician [[Gary Wilson (musician)|Gary Wilson]], directed by [[Michael Wolk]]. The film documents Wilson's career during the late 1970s/early 1980s and his return to the public eye in 2002 after two decades of self-imposed exile. It was shot entirely in [[DV]], with [[35mm]], [[16mm]], and [[8 mm film|8mm]] archival footage. The film was screened at several sold out independent theaters in 2005. The movie was released by [[Plexifilm]] on June 17, 2008. Wilson sold out a rare New York City concert on June 6, 2008 at The Knitting Factory to promote the film. ==External links== *[http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0458529/ IMDB entry (''You Think You Really Know Me: The Gary Wilson Story''] *[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KbN1v3hAZxE View the Official Trailer] *[http://www.sixpointfour.com Gary Wilson's official site] *[http://www.gorgeousentertainment.com/gary_wilson.html Gorgeous Entertainment's ''You Think You Really Know Me'' site] [[Category:Films about music and musicians]] [[Category:Documentary films about music and musicians]] [[Category:2005 films]] [[Category:American documentary films]] {{bio-documentary-film-stub}} {{music-documentary-film-stub}}
